Sentencas: The authors newly propose and investigate two types of carbon dioxide recovering SOFC/GT combined power generation systems in which a gas turbine with carbon dioxide recycle or water vapor injection is adopted as the bottoming cycle.
Titulo: High performance SOFC/GT combined power generation system with CO2 recovery by oxygen combustion method

Sentencas: In these systems, fuel gas is first introduced to a SOFC, and its exhaust fuel gas is afterburned by pure oxygen.
Titulo: High performance SOFC/GT combined power generation system with CO2 recovery by oxygen combustion method

Sentencas: Carbon dioxide or water vapor is also injected into the combustor to reduce the combustion gas temperature.
Titulo: High performance SOFC/GT combined power generation system with CO2 recovery by oxygen combustion method

Sentencas: The obtained combustion gas, which is composed of only carbon dioxide and water vapor, is introduced to a gas turbine in the bottoming cycle.
Titulo: High performance SOFC/GT combined power generation system with CO2 recovery by oxygen combustion method

Sentencas: The exhaust gas of the gas turbine preheats the injection gas, and then, carbon dioxide is separated by only cooling and water condensation.
Titulo: High performance SOFC/GT combined power generation system with CO2 recovery by oxygen combustion method

Sentencas: It is made clear that the overall efficiency of the system with carbon dioxide recycle reaches 63.87% (HHV) or 70.88% (LHV), and that of the system with water vapor injection reaches 65.00% (HHV) or 72.13% (LHV).
Titulo: High performance SOFC/GT combined power generation system with CO2 recovery by oxygen combustion method

Sentencas: These values are sufficiently high, indicating that the proposed systems are worth further research and development.
Titulo: High performance SOFC/GT combined power generation system with CO2 recovery by oxygen combustion method
